name: Foreman Braddock Hale
personality: Gruff, exhausted, fiercely protective of his crew.
description: Braddock oversees the Sloan mining operation. He’s lost too many workers to the quarry and refuses to send anyone else in until the deathclaws are dealt with.
questHooks: Needs help recovering equipment left in the quarry.
Says the quarry walls 'hum' at night — not wind, something deeper.
Knows about a sealed tunnel the deathclaws avoid.
